  • Method Details

    • drugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse drugs(@QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo) throws OperationNotSupportedException
      Throws:
      OperationNotSupportedException

    • drugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs{status}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse drugs(@QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo, @PathParam("status") String status) throws OperationNotSupportedException
      Gets drugs for the demographic and filter based on their status.
      Parameters:
      demographicNo - the demographic identifier to look up drugs for.
      status - the status to use to filter the results on {"", current, archived,}
      Returns:
      a response containing a list of drugs that meet the status criteria.
      Throws:
      AccessDeniedException - if the current user does not have permission to access this data.
      OperationNotSupportedException - if the requested status is unknown.

    • getDocumentCategories

      @GET @Path("rxStatus") @Produces("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getDocumentCategories()

    • drugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs/{status}/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse drugs(@PathParam("status") String status, @PathParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • getAllDrugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs/all/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse getAllDrugs(@PathParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • getCurrentDrugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs/current/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse getCurrentDrugs(@PathParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • getLongtermDrugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs/longterm/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse getLongtermDrugs(@PathParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • getArchivedDrugs

      @GET @Path("/drugs/archived/{demographicNo}") @Produces("application/json") public DrugSearchResponse getArchivedDrugs(@PathParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • addDrug

      @POST @Path("/new") @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DrugResponse addDrug(DrugTo1 transferObject, @QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)
      Adds a new drug to the drugs table.
      Parameters:
      transferObject - the drug information
      demographicNo - the identifier for the demographic this drug is for.
      Returns:
      a drug transfer object that reflects the new drug in the database.

    • updateDrug

      @Path("/update") @POST @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DrugResponse updateDrug(DrugTo1 transferObject, @QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)
      Updates a drug in the database identified by the drugId to reflect the data provided in the incoming transferObject. In the database this has the effect of: a) setting the drug with transferObject.drugId to archived; b) making a new entry that contains data from the transferObject.
      Parameters:
      transferObject - the data to make the update based on.
      demographicNo - the demographic this drug is for.
      Returns:
      a response object containing a drug transfer object that reflects updated version in the database.
      Throws:
      AccessDeniedException - if the current user is not allowed to write prescription information to this demographic.

    • discontinueDrug

      @Path("/discontinue") @POST @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public GenericRESTResponse discontinueDrug(@QueryParam("drugId") int drugId, @QueryParam("reason") String reason, @QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)
      Marks a drug in the database as discontinued. Requires a reason for discontinuing be provided.
      Parameters:
      drugId - the id of the drug to discontinue
      reason - the reason for discontinuing the drug, one of: {"adverseReaction","allergy","discontinuedByAnotherPhysician", "increasedRiskBenefitRatio", "newScientificEvidence", "noLongerNecessary" "ineffectiveTreatment", "other", "cost", "drugInteraction", "patientRequest", "unknown", "deleted", "simplifyingTreatment"}
      demographicNo - the demographic the drug is associated with.
      Returns:
      a generic response indicating success or failure.

    • represcribe

      @Path("/drug/{drugId}") @POST @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DrugResponse represcribe(@PathParam("drugId") Integer drugId)

    • prescribe

      @Path("/prescribe") @POST @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) @Consumes({"application/json","application/xml"}) public PrescriptionResponse prescribe(List<DrugTo1> drugTransferObjects, @QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)
      Creates a prescription for the drugs that are provided.
      Parameters:
      drugTransferObjects - a non-empty list of drugs to include on the prescription.
      demographicNo - the demographic this prescription is for.
      Returns:
      the completed prescription or an indication of failure.

    • history

      @Path("/history") @GET @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public DrugSearchResponse history(@QueryParam("id") int id, @QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)
      Looks up the history of a particular drug.
      Parameters:
      id - the drug identifier to get history for.
      demographicNo - the id of the demographic associated with the drug.
      Returns:
      a response containing the drugs in the history.

    • getPrescriptions

      @Path("/prescriptions") @GET @Produces("application/json") public List<PrescriptionTo1> getPrescriptions(@QueryParam("demographicNo") int demographicNo)

    • recordPrescriptionPrint

      @Path("/recordPrescriptionPrint/{scriptNo}") @GET @Produces("application/json") public PrescriptionTo1 recordPrescriptionPrint(@PathParam("scriptNo") int scriptNo)

    • favourites

      @Path("/favorites") @GET @Produces({"application/json","application/xml"}) public FavoriteResponse favourites()

    • watermark

      @GET @Path("/{demographicNo}/watermark/{rxNo}") @Produces("image/png") public javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput watermark(@PathParam("demographicNo") Integer demographicNo, @PathParam("rxNo") Integer rxNo, @Context javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, @Context javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

    • print

      @POST @Path("/{demographicNo}/print/{rxNo}") @Produces("application/pdf") @Consumes("application/json") public javax.ws.rs.core.StreamingOutput print(@PathParam("demographicNo") Integer demographicNo, @PathParam("rxNo") Integer rxNo, @Context javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, PrintRxTo1 transferObject)
